::: {.question} **Convertible Note with Discount** **Context:** Yara invested in a startup using a convertible note of **$1.541 million**, with a **20% discount**. When the company raised Series A at **$1.39 per share**, her note converted at the discounted price. ::: {.question-block}
1. How many shares did Yara receive upon conversion?
âœ… Shares = Note / Discounted Price = 1.541 million / 1.112 = **1.386 million shares**
::: :::
